name: Skateboard
long_description: a long plane of wood, sturdily attached to four miniature versions of Semi-Truck wheels.  Though the yellow and blue paint job has now faded to a blurred abstract behind years of scuff marks, it is clear that this is a quality [Skateboard] built to last- it could glide over a corpse with ease. You wonder why someone might have discarded such a treasure, and conclude they must have been kidnapped.
short_description: A blue and yellow tricked-out skateboard
